summary: With this mod you could summon a Dragon Priest to help you fight for 3 minutes!
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a Spell Tome which will add a new spell to summon a Dragon Priest.

-Location-
The spell tome can be found in FarengarÂ´s room in Dragonsreach.

-Installation-
Just drag the ESP into your Skyrim Data folder.

-Uninstall-
Just delete the ESP, be sure not to have the spell equipped.

I hope you guys like the mod!
author: AndreasTutaro
